verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto Jeremiah <WH3414> the second <WH8145> time, while he was yet shut up <WH6113> in the court <WH2691> of the prison <WH4307>, saying <WH559>,

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> the maker <WH6213> thereof, the LORD <WH3068> that formed <WH3335> it, to establish <WH3559> it; the LORD <WH3068> is his name <WH8034>; the LORD is: or, JEHOVAH, etc
Call <WH7121> unto me, and I will answer <WH6030> thee, and shew <WH5046> thee great <WH1419> and mighty things <WH1219>, which thou knowest <WH3045> not. mighty: or, hidden

For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, concerning the houses <WH1004> of this city <WH5892>, and concerning the houses <WH1004> of the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, which are thrown down <WH5422> by the mounts <WH5550>, and by the sword <WH2719>;

They come <WH935> to fight <WH3898> with the Chaldeans <WH3778>, but it is to fill <WH4390> them with the dead bodies <WH6297> of men <WH120>, whom I have slain <WH5221> in mine anger <WH639> and in my fury <WH2534>, and for all whose wickedness <WH7451> I have hid <WH5641> my face <WH6440> from this city <WH5892>.
Behold, I will bring <WH5927> it health <WH724> and cure <WH4832>, and I will cure <WH7495> them, and will reveal <WH1540> unto them the abundance <WH6283> of peace <WH7965> and truth <WH571>.
And I will cause the captivity <WH7622> of Judah <WH3063> and the captivity <WH7622> of Israel <WH3478> to return <WH7725>, and will build <WH1129> them, as at the first <WH7223>.

And I will cleanse <WH2891> them from all their iniquity <WH5771>, whereby they have sinned <WH2398> against me; and I will pardon <WH5545> all their iniquities <WH5771>, whereby they have sinned <WH2398>, and whereby they have transgressed <WH6586> against me.

And it shall be to me a name <WH8034> of joy <WH8342>, a praise <WH8416> and an honour <WH8597> before all the nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776>, which shall hear <WH8085> all the good <WH2896> that I do <WH6213> unto them: and they shall fear <WH6342> and tremble <WH7264> for all the goodness <WH2896> and for all the prosperity <WH7965> that I procure <WH6213> unto it.

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; Again there shall be heard <WH8085> in this place <WH4725>, which ye say <WH559> shall be desolate <WH2720> without man <WH120> and without beast <WH929>, even in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, and in the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, that are desolate <WH8074>, without man <WH120>, and without inhabitant <WH3427>, and without beast <WH929>,

The voice <WH6963> of joy <WH8342>, and the voice <WH6963> of gladness <WH8057>, the voice <WH6963> of the bridegroom <WH2860>, and the voice <WH6963> of the bride <WH3618>, the voice <WH6963> of them that shall say <WH559>, Praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>: for the LORD <WH3068> is good <WH2896>; for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>: and of them that shall bring <WH935> the sacrifice of praise <WH8426> into the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>. For I will cause to return <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of the land <WH776>, as at the first <WH7223>, saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>.

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>; Again in this place <WH4725>, which is desolate <WH2720> without man <WH120> and without beast <WH929>, and in all the cities <WH5892> thereof, shall be an habitation <WH5116> of shepherds <WH7462> causing their flocks <WH6629> to lie down <WH7257>.

In the cities <WH5892> of the mountains <WH2022>, in the cities <WH5892> of the vale <WH8219>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the south <WH5045>, and in the land <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>, and in the places about <WH5439> Jerusalem <WH3389>, and in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, shall the flocks <WH6629> pass again <WH5674> under the hands <WH3027> of him that telleth <WH4487> them, saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>.

Behold, the days <WH3117> come <WH935>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, that I will perform <WH6965> that good <WH2896> thing <WH1697> which I have promised <WH1696> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and to the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063>.

In those days <WH3117>, and at that time <WH6256>, will I cause the Branch <WH6780> of righteousness <WH6666> to grow up <WH6779> unto David <WH1732>; and he shall execute <WH6213> judgment <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> in the land <WH776>.

In those days <WH3117> shall Judah <WH3063> be saved <WH3467>, and Jerusalem <WH3389> shall dwell <WH7931> safely <WH983>: and this is the name wherewith she shall be called <WH7121>, The LORD our righteousness <WH3072>. The LORD: Heb. Jehovahtsidkenu

For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; David <WH1732> shall never <WH3808> want <WH3772> a man <WH376> to sit <WH3427> upon the throne <WH3678> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>; David: Heb. There shall not be cut off from David

Neither shall the priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881> want <WH3772> a man <WH376> before <WH6440> me to offer <WH5927> burnt offerings <WH5930>, and to kindle <WH6999> meat offerings <WH4503>, and to do <WH6213> sacrifice <WH2077> continually <WH3117>.
And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto Jeremiah <WH3414>, saying <WH559>,

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; If ye can break <WH6565> my covenant <WH1285> of the day <WH3117>, and my covenant <WH1285> of the night <WH3915>, and that there should not be day <WH3119> and night <WH3915> in their season <WH6256>;

Then may also my covenant <WH1285> be broken <WH6565> with David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>, that he should not have a son <WH1121> to reign <WH4427> upon his throne <WH3678>; and with the Levites <WH3881> the priests <WH3548>, my ministers <WH8334>.

As the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064> cannot be numbered <WH5608>, neither the sand <WH2344> of the sea <WH3220> measured <WH4058>: so will I multiply <WH7235> the seed <WH2233> of David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>, and the Levites <WH3881> that minister <WH8334> unto me.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came to Jeremiah <WH3414>, saying <WH559>,

Considerest <WH7200> thou not what this people <WH5971> have spoken <WH1696>, saying <WH559>, The two <WH8147> families <WH4940> which the LORD <WH3068> hath chosen <WH977>, he hath even cast them off <WH3988>? thus they have despised <WH5006> my people <WH5971>, that they should be no more a nation <WH1471> before <WH6440> them.

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; If my covenant <WH1285> be not with day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, and if I have not appointed <WH7760> the ordinances <WH2708> of heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>;

Then <WH1571> will I cast away <WH3988> the seed <WH2233> of Jacob <WH3290>, and David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>, so that I will not take <WH3947> any of his seed <WH2233> to be rulers <WH4910> over the seed <WH2233> of Abraham <WH85>, Isaac <WH3446>, and Jacob <WH3290>: for I will cause their captivity <WH7622> to return <WH7725> <WH7725>, and have mercy <WH7355> on them.
